document.discussion_title: Money advice service from Daventry housing association helps people save £229,000
document.topic_text: Search Money advice service from Daventry housing association helps people save £229,000 0 Have your say An innovative money advice scheme run by a housing association in Daventry has already helped people save an estimated £229,000. The money advice service, introduced by Futures Housing Group (formerly Daventry and District Housing), helps people who are struggling financially to access benefits they may be entitled to, reduce fuel bills and budget for the future. Customers can book an appointment themselves or be referred by other Futures employees, such as housing or income officers. Since its launch, the money advice team has helped 82 customers with 74 people making... read more
